Timothy Wall wrote:
> Here's one option, others are probably available usin=
g "if" and
> "condition": 
> 
> <target name=3D"default-value" unless=3D"te=
stfile">
> 	<property name=3D"testfile" value=3D"default-value"/>
> </targe=
t>

That's unnecessarily complicated. Simply use

	<property name=3D"testfi=
le" value=3D"default-value"/>

Properties can't be overridden, so if it is =
already set (for example
from the command line), it still would have the or=
iginal value.

Regards, Ilja
